system_summary: This system provides a web interface and command-line tools for intelligent analysis of GitHub repositories using a dedicated AI agent.

components.label: Web Frontend
components.role: Provides a user interface for users to interact with the project analysis system, visualize results, and manage configurations.

components.label: Web API Backend
components.role: Exposes RESTful APIs for the frontend, handles authentication, orchestrates analysis tasks for the AI agent, and integrates with GitHub.

components.label: GitHub Project AI Agent
components.role: A specialized service that performs intelligent analysis of GitHub repositories, processing code and generating insights or performing automated actions.

components.label: Command Line Interface
components.role: Allows direct command-line interaction for setup, configuration, and triggering analysis or operations, often bypassing the web interface.

components.label: GitHub External Service
components.role: The official GitHub API and services, providing source code, repository metadata, and webhook capabilities.

components.label: Application Database
components.role: Persists application state, user data, configuration, and the results generated by the project analysis agent.

connections.label: Accesses repository data (e.g., clone, read files)
